城市发展影响老龄化人口的健康随着时间的推移，其独特的城市增长轨迹对其老龄居民健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Urban-development-impacts-health-of-aging-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Urban-development-impacts-health-of-aging-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54d6cdae-5b20-419a-a356-2258e853010f Wed, 19 Jun 2024 08:13:00 -0400 Urban development impacts health of aging populations
个性化大脑回路评分定义六种抑郁和焦虑生物型研究人员利用脑回路功能的功能磁共振成像数据，为焦虑和抑郁患者得出可解释的、个性化的脑回路功能障碍评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Personalized-brain- Circuit-scores-define-six-depression-and-anxiety-biotypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Personalized-brain- Circuit-scores-define-six-depression-and-anxiety-biotypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92595a74-b9f1-4a74-b491-74c78b49d7d0 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 07:31:00 -0400 Personalized brain circuit scores define six depression and anxiety biotypes

报告显示，四分之一的父母表示，他们的孩子因为担心或焦虑而无法入睡研究结果表明，虽然大多数父母都为孩子制定了就寝时间，但许多孩子在就寝时会感到焦虑或不安，五分之一的孩子服用褪黑激素来帮助他们入睡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/1-in-4-parents-say-their-young-child-cane28099t-go-to-sleep-because-of-being-worried-or-焦虑报告揭示.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/1-in-4-parents-say-their-young-child-cane28099t-go-to-sleep-because-of-being-worried-or-焦虑报告揭示.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3ff7a5b-74e5-4a8b-9d75-d771ca45c6a9 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 06:47:00 -0400 1 in 4 parents say their young child can’t go to sleep because of being worried or anxious, report reveals
TOMI环境解决方案支持合作伙伴和客户抗击全球禽流感（H5N1）禽流感疫情TOMI Environmental Solutions, Inc.®（“TOMI”）是一家专门从事消毒和净化业务的全球性公司，通过其 SteraMist 品牌产品利用其一流的二元电离技术 (BIT) 平台，今天宣布该公司正在与客户和合作伙伴密切合作支持抗击目前在全球范围内造成广泛破坏的禽流感（H5N1）爆发的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/TOMI-Environmental-Solutions-supports-partners-and-customers-to-combat-global-avian-influenza-(H5N1)-bird-flu-outbreak。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/TOMI-Environmental-Solutions-supports-partners-and-customers-to-combat-global-avian-influenza-(H5N1)-bird-flu-outbreak。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe20d046-214d-48b6-af20-08623a0f675f Wed, 19 Jun 2024 04:37:00 -0400 TOMI Environmental Solutions supports partners and customers to combat global avian influenza (H5N1) bird flu outbreak
第四频道《超级外科医生：生命的机会》新一季回归Wonderhood 的《超级外科医生：生命的机会》第二季将于 6 月 18 日播出，让观众独家了解世界领先的综合癌症中心皇家马斯登 NHS 基金会信托基金的幕后花絮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Super-Surgeons-A-Chance-at-Life-returns-with-new-season-on-Channel-4.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Super-Surgeons-A-Chance-at-Life-returns-with-new-season-on-Channel-4.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f2d779d-9628-42a7-92b5-565ae5b89b71 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:58:00 -0400 Super Surgeons: A Chance at Life returns with new season on Channel 4

研究表明坚果可以成为健康减肥计划的一部分无论是撒在早上的麦片上还是作为下午的零食，在减肥方面，一把坚果可能是下一个最好的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Nuts-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-plan-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Nuts-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-plan-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6256ca97-5cda-42ec-a984-1941a3d1a89c Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:36:00 -0400 Nuts can be part of a healthy weight loss plan, study shows
新型人工智能工具有望重塑早期药物发现中的虚拟筛选由莫纳什大学领导的澳大利亚研究人员发明了一种新的人工智能（AI）工具，该工具有望重塑药物发现早期的虚拟筛选，并增强科学家识别潜在新药的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Novel-AI-tool-poished-to-reshape-virtual-screening-in-early-stage-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Novel-AI-tool-poished-to-reshape-virtual-screening-in-early-stage-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51736d70-d553-4770-a5ca-ce97c2ac411c Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:32:00 -0400 Novel AI tool poised to reshape virtual screening in early stage drug discovery
研究人员提出了一种“蛋白质聚集时钟”来测量衰老和健康测量细胞中的蛋白质团块是否可以成为找出罹患与年龄相关疾病的风险的新方法？美因茨约翰内斯古腾堡大学 (JGU) 的 Dorothee Dormann 教授和 Edward Lemke 教授（同时也是美因茨分子生物学研究所 (IMB) 的兼职主任）提出了“蛋白质聚集时钟”的概念，用于测量衰老和健康状况新观点文章发表在《自然细胞生物学》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Researchers-propose-a- Protein-aggregation-clock-to-measure-aging-and-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Researchers-propose-a- Protein-aggregation-clock-to-measure-aging-and-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ac03cbc-fa26-4396-a110-f0b23aaf4d2e Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:27:00 -0400 Researchers propose a 'protein aggregation clock' to measure aging and health
